title: 'Prices too high'
body: 'Really want to buy the XL size in Black colour in this.. You have increased the prices sooo much of all the JJ Vallaya products.. wanted to reall buy the Bandhgala one as well.. But soo high the prices are.. Can you please slash your prices.. thanks.. The beige one is good though üëç'

title: 'Awesome'
body: That's really awesome, bought for my 15 years old son... Stylish design... Very good discount
